name: VRNationHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Just ask Alexa to install VR Nation Headlines to get included in your flash briefing, the newest headlines from the world of virtual reality, augmented reality, and mixed reality.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
